Text.Name: SYS_LOASITEM
Text.Desc: A lost building that nobody recognizes. \n(Empty)

Text.Name: Item_HorribleMeal
Text.Desc: A dish of which the cooking has failed, its taste only barely acceptable. Can only serve to fill the stomach.

Text.Name: Item_HomeFood
Text.Desc: A simple home-made dish, tastes average but sincere.

Text.Name: Item_DeliciousFood
Text.Desc: A delicacy, both the ingredients and techniques with which it's made are quite sophisticated. It tastes very delicious.

Text.Name: Item_DelicacyFood
Text.Desc: A lavish meal that can only be accomplished with superb cooking skills and exquisite ingredients, tastes extremely delicious.

Text.Name: Item_GuanyinMud
Text.Desc: A kind of white clay that is considered an alternative to food during desperate times.

Text.Name: Item_Water
Text.Desc: A portion of clean water.

Text.Name: Item_DirtyWater
Text.Desc: Unclean water. There seems to be something moving in it.

Text.Name: Item_Garbage
Text.Desc: Useless waste.

Text.Name: Item_Shit
Text.Desc: Creature's feces.

Text.Name: Item_DragonShit
Text.Desc: Excrement of a dragon.

Text.Name: Item_FunPainting
Text.Desc: A painted picture.

Text.Name: Item_FunPoem
Text.Desc: A written work.

Text.Name: Item_FunMusic
Text.Desc: A musical score sheet.

Text.Name: Item_FunChess
Text.Desc: A Go chess diagram that recorded a match.

Text.Name: Item_SysAxe
Text.Desc: An axe can greatly increase your logging efficiency. Of course, it can also be used as a weapon.

Text.Name: Item_SysPickaxe
Text.Desc: A pickaxe can greatly increase your mining speed. Of course, it can also be used as a weapon.

Text.Name: Item_SysSickle
Text.Desc: A set of farm tools can hugely increase your farming speed and harvesting speed.

Text.Name: Item_SysAcupuncture
Text.Desc: An acupuncture set that can improve the quality and success rate of healing.

Text.Name: Item_Umbrella
Text.Desc: An umbrella.

Text.Name: Item_Esoterica
Text.Desc: A secret manual.

Text.Name: Item_StoneBox
Text.Desc: Mysterious stone casket about one foot in size. The exterior hull is an integral whole, seems like it's no ordinary thing.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_StoneBox1
Text.Desc: A stone casket obtained by a hunter named Zhang Erwa from the Nanping Village. It is of a strange quality and invulnerable to water and fire.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_E_FaBaoBox
Text.Desc: On the night of the attack, you noticed that the artifact room has been breached. You couldn't bear to see such rarities get looted, and so you risked your life to save a few of them into a casket and took it away.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_E_DanBox
Text.Desc: On the night of the attack, you noticed that the elixir room has been breached. You couldn't bear to see such rarities get looted, and so you risked your life to save a few of them into a casket and took it away.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_E_MiJiBox
Text.Desc: On the night of the attack, you noticed that the Scriptorium has been breached. You couldn't bear to see such rarities get looted, and so you risked your life to save a few of them into a casket and took it away.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_E_FuBox
Text.Desc: On the night of the attack, you noticed that the talisman room has been breached. You couldn't bear to see such rarities get looted, and so you risked your life to save a few of them into a casket and took it away.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_StoneBox2
Text.Desc: A stone casket buried deep beneath mountain rocks, appears to be quite dated. It is unknown what it contains.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_BuildingBox
Text.Desc: A packed building that can be repositioned somewhere.

Text.Name: Item_Baobeier
Text.Desc: Memorable stuff.

Text.Name: Item_LunHui_Box1
Text.Desc: Mrs. Lu carries a magical talisman box with three mysterious talismans inside.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_LunHui_Box2
Text.Desc: A magical talisman box carried by Yang Shu with him, it contains three mysterious talismans.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_ZuShiZhiCi
Text.Desc: A gift from the ancestral master, with much appreciated treasure inside.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_SuoYingZhiJuan
Text.Desc: It records the miniatures of all living things from all ages since the birth of heaven and earth to the present. If you know the true name of the creature in question, you can summon it from the scroll. It is one of the twelve primordial Numinous Treasure of Chaos.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_XiangHuo1
Text.Desc: A basic ritual, with a relatively simple process. Generates 1 Faith. Additional Faith can be generated by using high-level food as offerings in the ritual.

Text.Name: Item_XiangHuo2
Text.Desc: Medium-level ritual, which requires the usage of some artifacts. Generates 4 Faith. Additional Faith can be generated by using high-level food as offerings in the ritual.

Text.Name: Item_XiangHuo3
Text.Desc: Ritual of the highest level, it requires sophisticated artifacts and extended prayers. Generates 9 Faith. Additional Faith can be generated by using high-level food as offerings in the ritual.

Text.Name: Item_XiangHuo4
Text.Desc: A basic ritual of god, with a relatively simple process. Generates 1 Faith. Additional Faith can be generated by using high-level food as offerings in the ritual.

Text.Name: Item_XiangHuo5
Text.Desc: Medium-level ritual of god, which requires the usage of some instruments. Generates 4 Faith. Additional Faith can be generated by using high-level food as offerings in the ritual.

Text.Name: Item_XiangHuo6
Text.Desc: Ritual of god of the highest level, it requires sophisticated instruments and extended prayers. Generates 9 Faith. Additional Faith can be generated by using high-level food as offerings in the ritual.

Text.Name: Item_OldSchool_Letter
Text.Desc: A letter left by the mysterious cultivator who saved you from danger on the night the sect was massacred.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Read

Text.Name: Item_StrangeMush
Text.Desc: Strange mushroom, consumption may cause hallucination.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Attempt eating

Text.Name: Item_AuctionPaper
Text.Desc: Invitation letter to an auction held by Ye Xuan.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Inspect

Text.Name: Item_GodPractice_MiJuan
Text.Desc: A secret scroll that circulated during ancient times, its content unknown.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine

Text.Name: Item_GodPractice_MiJuan_1
Text.Desc: A sheet of paper that records how to materialize Miracle Site: Heavenly Palace, which only the cultivators of Law of Shendao can comprehend.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine

Text.Name: Item_GodPractice_MiJuan_2
Text.Desc: A sheet of paper that records how to materialize Miracle Site: Altar of Investiture, which only the cultivators of Law of Shendao can comprehend.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine

Text.Name: Item_GodPractice_MiJuan_3
Text.Desc: A sheet of paper that records how to materialize Miracle Site: Melancholia of Mortal Realm, which only the cultivators of Law of Shendao can comprehend.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine

Text.Name: Item_GodPractice_MiJuan_4
Text.Desc: A sheet of paper that records how to materialize Miracle Site: Generality Residence; Miracle Site: Residence of Connection, which only the cultivators of Law of Shendao can comprehend.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine

Text.Name: Item_GodPractice_MiJuan_6
Text.ThingName: Miracle Site Scroll Fragment: Sacred Pavilion
Text.Desc: Scroll fragments that recorded a special method to construct the Sacred Pavilion, which only the cultivators of Law of Shendao are able to comprehend.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine

Text.Name: Item_GodPractice_MiJuan_5
Text.Desc: A peculiar ball that was sealed with the power of Heavenly Tribulation. It is unknown what is kept inside.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Unseal

Text.Name: Item_Gong12
Text.Desc: A school of teachings thought to come from the Golden Immortal Yunzhong Zi. It found a new way outside of the traditional system of Golden Core Cultivation. Seizing the moment of breakthrough, one would be able to congeal five Natal Talismans, which have fascinating uses.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine

Text.Name: Item_Body_Gong_2
Text.Desc: A remold spell created by human physical cultivators in reference to ancient sages' natural Yaoguai bodies. This spell is noted for its wild and aggressive nature and excels at refining bones to eventually create a Barbarous Forging Body. The physical body becomes divine and embraces oblivion.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine

Text.Name: Item_Body_Gong_5
Text.Desc: In the past, some physical cultivators thought of this life as a cage and polar nights are the light cast from outside the cage. They absorbed a strange essence from the polar nights and used it to remold the body, believing it will eventually be transformed into a vehicle that breaks the cage and carries them away from the misery. This school of physical cultivators worshiped polar nights and were shunned by everyone else, thus named Obliteration Cult. Their foundational Law is therefore called Obliteration Body.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine

Text.Name: Item_God_GongAll
Text.Desc: This book recorded several ancient methods of cultivating Law of Shendao. It was compiled during the reign of Emperor of Demons when it dominated.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine

Text.Name: Item_God_Guard1
Text.Desc: Lumina Core with the power of the star Polis dwelling within it. Perhaps one can harness this power to use as Guard by interacting with it through Law of Shendao.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Examine

Text.Name: Item_God_Guard2
Text.Desc: Lumina Core with the power of the star Alkaid dwelling within it. Perhaps one can harness this power to use as Guard by interacting with it through Law of Shendao.

Text.Name: Item_God_Guard3
Text.Desc: Lumina Core with the power of the star Dubhe dwelling within it. Perhaps one can harness this power to use as Guard by interacting with it through Law of Shendao.

Text.Name: Item_Sys_Gong
Text.Desc: A set of Laws.

Text.Name: Item_Firecracker
Text.Desc: Peculiar toy from the Otherworld. Choose a place to set it off and it can easily attract people around you to watch. It is a pretty intimidating device for the faint-hearted.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Light

Text.Name: Item_FirecrackerShit
Text.Desc: Specially processed firecracker. Very terrifying.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Light

Text.Name: Item_Jiaozi
Text.Desc: Food from the Otherworld, filled with good wishes and festive joys. Eat it and you may discover some pleasant surprise!

Text.Name: Item_Yingbi1
Text.Desc: Firm metal disc hidden inside dumplings, it harbored the good wishes of many Otherworld beings longing for happiness and wealth. Torch Dragon, the manifestation of the Rule of Yin and Yang in this world, has recently become a little strange under the influence of Otherworld. It seems to be very interested in this object.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Rub

Text.Name: Item_Yingbi2
Text.Desc: Firm metal disc hidden inside dumplings, it harbored the good wishes of many Otherworld beings longing for longevity and health. Torch Dragon, the manifestation of the Rule of Yin and Yang in this world, has recently become a little strange under the influence of Otherworld. It seems to be very interested in this object.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Rub

Text.Name: Item_Yingbi3
Text.Desc: Firm metal disc hidden inside dumplings, it harbored the good wishes of many Otherworld beings longing for nice new clothes. Torch Dragon, the manifestation of the Rule of Yin and Yang in this world, has recently become a little strange under the influence of Otherworld. It seems to be very interested in this object.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Rub

Text.Name: Item_SpringBox
Text.Desc: Mysterious gift from Otherworld, it is referred to as "festive goods" by people living in there.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Open

Text.Name: Item_SuperPartItem
Text.Desc: Physical cultivators can study it in order to gain new knowledge about Secret Bodies.
Text.StoryBnts.0.Name: Inspiration

Text.Name: Item_AnimalBox
Text.Desc: Inside the cage is a carefully cultivated animal at the Awakening State.

Text.Name: Item_NormalAnimalBox
Text.Desc: Inside the simple cage is an animal at the Awakening State.

Text.Name: Item_BodyAnimalBox
Text.Desc: Inside the cage is an animal at the Awakening State.
